name: labyrinth (itch) (arachnid56)
description:
Brackeys Jam 2020.2 (REWIND) submission

A puzzle based dungeon crawler. Use the rewind time mechanic to escape danger, defeat enemies and find your way out of  the labyrinth

Controls

WASD to move

SPACE to rewind time

ESC to open menu or quit game

ENTER to play game from menu

All art and programming done by me (game written in python/pygame).

Font used: https://www.dafont.com/back-to-the-fantasy.font

Sound effects: https://www.freesfx.co.uk/sfx

Soundtrack: https://wingless-seraph.net/en/material-music.html
